info.title: Traceability Vocabulary Specification
info.description:
Traceability Schemas in OpenAPI format for use with swagger, redoc and similar

Demonstrates how to utilize the schemas over OpenAPI as there is not a direct 1:1 translation between OpenAPI and JSON Schema

AgInspectionReport.title: Agriculture Inspection Report
AgInspectionReport.description: Information on the Inspection and the observations made

inspector.title: Inspector
inspector.description: Inspector performing the Agriculture Inspection.  The following link provides further insight: https://www.lawinsider.com/dictionary/food-inspector

shipment.title: Shipment
shipment.description: Details for a shipment of goods.

applicant.title: Applicant
applicant.description: Entity that is applying for the inspection.

observation.title: Observation List
observation.description: List of observations as seen and specified in the Inspection Report schema https://w3id.org/traceability?#InspectionReport

property.name: Torque-controlled fatigue testing
property.description: ISO 1352:2011 specifies the conditions for performing torsional, constant-amplitude, nominally elastic stress fatigue tests on metallic specimens without deliberately introducing stress concentrations. The tests are carried out at ambient temperature (ideally at between 10 °C and 35 °C) in air by applying a pure couple to the specimen about its longitudinal axis.

AgPackage.title: AgPackage
AgPackage.description: A package (container, crate, etc.) which holds agricultural products. The contents or the package itself should meet the requirements as specified here: https://www.producetraceability.org/documents/FINAL_PTI_Harmonized_Traceabilty_Case_Label_April_2020_(003).pdf

packageName.title: Package Name
packageName.description: Name of the items within the package.

grade.title: Food Grade
grade.description: Grade of the agricultural products contained within the package.  The following link contains more information on USDA food grading: https://www.ams.usda.gov/grades-standards

responsibleParty.title: Responsible Party
responsibleParty.description: Entity that produced and packaged the products.

voicePickCode.title: Voice Pick Code
voicePickCode.description: A four digit code digest of the GTIN code and Lot Code for use in integrating with voice picking systems. See the following PDF for more information: https://www.produceinventory.com/files/newsroom/Voice-Pick-Code.pdf

date.title: Packing, Harvest, or Best By Date
date.description: Human readable date describing the date the package was packed, harvested, or is 'best by.'

labelImageHash.title: Label Image Hash
labelImageHash.description: Hash value for securely identifying the label image

agProduct.title: Product List
agProduct.description: List of agricultural products contained within this package.

AgProduct.title: AgProduct
AgProduct.description: An agricultural product, extending the Product.json schema.  This schema accounts for the FDA lebeling data requirements at the crate level as specified here: https://www.producetraceability.org/documents/FINAL_PTI_Harmonized_Traceabilty_Case_Label_April_2020_(003).pdf

upc.title: UPC Number
upc.description: UPC (aka UPC-A) consists of 12 numeric digits that are uniquely assigned to each trade item. Along with the related EAN barcode, the UPC is the barcode mainly used for scanning of trade items at the point of sale, per GS1 specifications.

plu.title: PLU Number
plu.description: PLUs are a system of numbers that uniquely identify bulk produce sold in grocery stores and supermarkets.  See the following link for further information: https://www.pma.com/content/articles/2014/05/plu-codes

gtin.title: GTIN Code
gtin.description: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) can be used by a company to uniquely identify all of its trade items.

product.title: Product
product.description: Product details as specified in the Product.json schema

labelImageHash.title: Label Image Hash
labelImageHash.description: Hash value for securely identifying the label image.  More information can be found at the following link: https://cybersecurityglossary.com/hashing

CertifidMillTestReportCredential.title: Certified Mill Test Report Verifiable Credential
CertifidMillTestReportCredential.description: Certifications made by a manufacturer of a metal product.

relatedLink.title: Related Link
relatedLink.description: Links related to this verifiable credential

example.name: Certified Mill Test Report
example.description: This document includes recommended mill certificate fields as specified by US CBP

inspection.comment: This product spray coated in anti corrosive film which must be removed before use.

property.name: Torque-controlled fatigue testing
property.description: ISO 1352:2011 specifies the conditions for performing torsional, constant-amplitude, nominally elastic stress fatigue tests on metallic specimens without deliberately introducing stress concentrations. The tests are carried out at ambient temperature (ideally at between 10 °C and 35 °C) in air by applying a pure couple to the specimen about its longitudinal axis.

property.name: Torque-controlled fatigue testing
property.description: ISO 1352:2011 specifies the conditions for performing torsional, constant-amplitude, nominally elastic stress fatigue tests on metallic specimens without deliberately introducing stress concentrations. The tests are carried out at ambient temperature (ideally at between 10 °C and 35 °C) in air by applying a pure couple to the specimen about its longitudinal axis.

property.name: Rockwell Hardness Test (Scale A)
property.description: The Rockwell hardness test is an empirical indentation hardness test that can provide useful information about metallic materials.

property.name: Izod Impact Strength Test
property.description: ISO 180 defines the method used for pendulums to determine the impact resistance of a plastic specimen when supported in a cantilever configuration. Test results are used to evaluate the resilience of materials, typically plastics.

ChargeDeclaration.title: ChargeDeclaration
ChargeDeclaration.description: Charge Declaration definition based on IATA electronic Air Way Bill https://blanker.org/files/air-waybill-2.xls

ChemicalProperty.title: Chemical Property
ChemicalProperty.description: A property, used to indicate attributes and relationships of some Thing; equivalent to rdf:Property.

formula.title: Formula
formula.description: A chemical formula is a way of presenting information about the chemical proportions of atoms that constitute a particular chemical compound or molecule, using chemical element symbols, numbers, and sometimes also other symbols, such as parentheses, dashes, brackets, commas and plus and minus signs.

inchi.title: InChI
inchi.description: The IUPAC International Chemical Identifier (InChI) is a textual identifier for chemical substances, designed to provide a standard way to encode molecular information and to facilitate the search for such information in databases and on the web.

inchikey.title: InChIKey
inchikey.description: The condensed, 27 character InChIKey is a hashed version of the full InChI (using the SHA-256 algorithm), designed to allow for easy web searches of chemical compounds.

address.title: Postal Address
address.description: The postal address for an organization or place.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Customer record based on Customer from schema.org

GeoCoordinates.title: Geographic Coordinates
GeoCoordinates.description: The geographic coordinates of a place or event.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Angular distance North or South from the earth's equator measured through 90 degrees.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The arc or portion of the earth's equator intersected between the meridian of a given place and the prime meridian and expressed in degrees.

property.name: Charpy Impact Strength Test
property.description: ISO 148-1:2016 specifies the Charpy (V-notch and U-notch) pendulum impact test method for determining the energy absorbed in an impact test of metallic materials. This part of ISO 148 does not cover instrumented impact testing, which is specified in ISO 14556.

property.name: Rockwell Hardness Test (Scale A)
property.description: The Rockwell hardness test is an empirical indentation hardness test that can provide useful information about metallic materials.

property.name: Rockwell Hardness Test (Scale A)
property.description: The Rockwell hardness test is an empirical indentation hardness test that can provide useful information about metallic materials.

property.name: Izod Impact Strength Test
property.description: ISO 180 defines the method used for pendulums to determine the impact resistance of a plastic specimen when supported in a cantilever configuration. Test results are used to evaluate the resilience of materials, typically plastics.

property.name: Izod Impact Strength Test
property.description: ISO 180 defines the method used for pendulums to determine the impact resistance of a plastic specimen when supported in a cantilever configuration. Test results are used to evaluate the resilience of materials, typically plastics.

Inspector.title: Inspector
Inspector.description: Information on the person performing an inspection

qualification.title: Qualification List
qualification.description: List of qualifications relevant to the inspection.

IntentToSell.title: IntentToSell
IntentToSell.description: A simple case where an entity (person or organization) wishes to notify some third party that they intend to sell some product, likely into a different geographic region than in originated in.  This is a highly simplified version of an LOI that can be used to identify and declare intent earlier in the process than would be possible otherwise.  This object may be easily subclassed for extension with other data for other cases where additional regulatory data may be required

seller.title: Seller
seller.description: Entity that is declaring their intention for a product to be used at a different location than where it was created.

purchaser.title: Purchaser
purchaser.description: Entity that is expected to receive some amount of the product, though possibly a reseller.

product.title: Product
product.description: Product details as specified in the Product.json schema

sellByDate.title: Sell By Date
sellByDate.description: Date delcared as a non-binding target to sell product by.

product.name: Unbranded Metal Chicken
product.description: The Apollotech B340 is an affordable wireless mouse with reliable connectivity, 12 months battery life and modern design

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: A statement of the money due for goods or services; a bill.

IssuerAgent.title: IssuerAgent
IssuerAgent.description: IssuerAgent definition based on IATA electronic Air Way Bill https://blanker.org/files/air-waybill-2.xls

example.accountingInformation: Please charge to Account 123 and not Account 321

ItemShipped.title: Part of an Ecommerce Order
ItemShipped.description: Part of an Order listed in the Evidence data for a registered eCommerce Packing List based on schema.org

productID.title: Product ID
productID.example: Product number of registering Legal Entity such as an ISBN (required)

weight.title: Weight of the product
weight.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measrure (kg) (required)

height.title: Height of the product
height.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measrure (meter) (required)

width.title: Width of the product
width.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measrure (meter) (required)

depth.title: Depth of the Product
depth.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measrure (meter)(required)

example.name: Unbranded Soft Chicken
example.description: Boston's most advanced compression wear technology increases muscle oxygenation, stabilizes active muscles

LegalEntityIdentifierCredential.title: LegalEntityIdentifierCredential
LegalEntityIdentifierCredential.description: GLEIF verifiable Legal Entity Identifier Credential (verifiable leiCode Credential)

leiCode.title: leiCode
leiCode.description: leiCode - An organization identifier that uniquely identifies a legal entity as defined in ISO 17442

certificateName.title: certificateName
certificateName.description: Specific name of issued legal entity certificate

LEIaddress.title: LEIaddress
LEIaddress.description: GLEIF LEI Redord Level 1 Schema for LEI Address

LEIauthority.title: LEIauthority
LEIauthority.description: GLEIF LEI Redord Level 1 Schema for LEI Authority

LEIentity.title: LEIentity
LEIentity.description: GLEIF LEI Redord Level 1 Schema for LEI Entity

LEIregistration.title: LEIregistration
LEIregistration.description: GLEIF LEI Redord Level 1 Schema for LEI Registration

LinkRole.title: Link Role
LinkRole.description: A Role that represents a Web link e.g. as expressed via the 'url' property.

target.title: Target
target.description: An entry point, within some Web-based protocol.

linkRelationship.title: Link Relationship
linkRelationship.description: Indicates the relationship type of a link.

MeasuredProperty.title: Measured Property
MeasuredProperty.description: A property, used to indicate attributes and relationships of some Thing; equivalent to rdf:Property.

example.name: Charpy Impact Strength Test
example.description: ISO 148-1:2016 specifies the Charpy (V-notch and U-notch) pendulum impact test method for determining the energy absorbed in an impact test of metallic materials. This part of ISO 148 does not cover instrumented impact testing, which is specified in ISO 14556.

value.title: Measurement Value
value.description: A floating-point numeric value that is qualified by the corresponding measurement unit code - see gs1:unitCode.

unitCode.title: Measurement Unit
unitCode.description: A string value indicating a Measurement Unit from UN/ECE Recommendation 20, Units of Measure used in International Trade, e.g., GRM = gram - see rec20_rev3

MechanicalProperty.title: Mechanical Property
MechanicalProperty.description: A property, used to indicate attributes and relationships of some Thing; equivalent to rdf:Property.

example.name: Charpy Impact Strength Test
example.description: ISO 148-1:2016 specifies the Charpy (V-notch and U-notch) pendulum impact test method for determining the energy absorbed in an impact test of metallic materials. This part of ISO 148 does not cover instrumented impact testing, which is specified in ISO 14556.

Observation.title: Observation
Observation.description: Instances of the class Observation are used to specify observations about an entity at a particular time.

property.name: Rockwell Hardness Test (Scale A)
property.description: The Rockwell hardness test is an empirical indentation hardness test that can provide useful information about metallic materials.

OrderedItem.title: Order Item Record
OrderedItem.description: Order Item Record based on orderedItem from schema.org

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: An organization such as a corporation, firm, club, etc.

globalLocationNumber.title: Global Location Number
globalLocationNumber.description: The GS1 GLN of the organization.

address.title: Postal Address
address.description: The postal address for an organization or place.

contactPoint.title: Contact Point
contactPoint.description: Points of contact for this organization

ParcelDelivery.title: Parcel Delivery
ParcelDelivery.description: Details on a shipment or delivery.

deliveryAddress.title: Delivery Address
deliveryAddress.description: Final destination address to which the shipment is being sent.

originAddress.title: Origin Address
originAddress.description: Address from where the shipment was sent.

deliveryMethod.title: Delivery Method
deliveryMethod.description: The means of transportation used in delivering the shipment.

expectedArrival.title: Expected Arrival
expectedArrival.description: The earliest date the package may arrive.

consignee.title: Consignee
consignee.description: The consignee is the entity who is financially responsible for the receipt of a shipment.

PartOfOrder.title: Part of an Order
PartOfOrder.description: Part of an Order listed in the Evidence data for a registered eCommerce Packing List based on schema.org

itemsShipped.title: Products to be shipped belonging to an Order

itemsShipped.name: Generic Steel Shirt
itemsShipped.description: The beautiful range of Apple Naturalé that has an exciting mix of natural ingredients. With the Goodness of 100% Natural Ingredients

itemsShipped.name: Unbranded Plastic Hat
itemsShipped.description: Carbonite web goalkeeper gloves are ergonomically designed to give easy fit

itemsShipped.name: Tasty Wooden Keyboard
itemsShipped.description: Ergonomic executive chair upholstered in bonded black leather and PVC padded seat and back for all-day comfort and support

itemsShipped.name: Awesome Concrete Mouse
itemsShipped.description: New ABC 13 9370, 13.3, 5th Gen CoreA5-8250U, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, power UHD Graphics, OS 10 Home, OS Office A & J 2016

Phytosanitary.title: Phytosanitary
Phytosanitary.description: Generalized schema capture of most common phytosanitary inspection data and properties.  Any phyto forms that deviate greatly from this will need their own schemas, unless it seems like the properties are more universal and should be added to this schema.

plantOrg.title: Plant Protection Organization
plantOrg.description: The phytosanitary standard-setting organization for a region.

distinguishingMarks.title: Distinguishing Marks
distinguishingMarks.description: Any notable marks or variants of the items being inspected.

portOfEntry.title: Port of Entry
portOfEntry.description: US port through which the imports passed.  Click the following link for more information: https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/CFR-2011-title19-vol1/pdf/CFR-2011-title19-vol1-sec24-24.pdf

additionalDeclaration.title: Additional Declaration
additionalDeclaration.description: Additional declaration for the plants being shipped and inspected.

disinfectionDate.title: Disinfection Date
disinfectionDate.description: Date when the disinfection treatment was applied.

disinfectionTreatment.title: Disinfection Treatment
disinfectionTreatment.description: Type of disinfection treatment applied to the product. More information can be found at the following link: https://www.ecfr.gov/cgi-bin/text-idx?rgn=div5&node=7:5.1.1.1.4#se7.5.305_12

disinfectionChemical.title: Disinfection Chemical
disinfectionChemical.description: Chemical and/or active ingredient used in the disinfection.

disinfectionDuration.title: Disinfection Duration
disinfectionDuration.description: Duraction that the disinfection chemical was applied.

disinfectionTemperature.title: Disinfection Temperature
disinfectionTemperature.description: Temperature at which the disinfection chemical was applied.

disinfectionConcentration.title: Disinfection Concentration
disinfectionConcentration.description: Chemical concentration at which the disinfection chemical was applied in the disinfection process. More information can be found at the following link: https://chem.libretexts.org/Bookshelves/General_Chemistry/Map%3A_Chemistry_-_The_Central_Science_(Brown_et_al.)/04._Reactions_in_Aqueous_Solution/4.5%3A_Concentration_of_Solutions

signatureDate.title: signatureDate
signatureDate.description: Date when the inspection was signed by the inspection officer.

inspector.title: Inspector
inspector.description: Inspector performing the Agriculture Inspection.  More information can be found at the following link: https://www.lawinsider.com/dictionary/food-inspector

shipment.title: Shipment
shipment.description: Details for a shipment of goods.

agPackage.title: Agriculture Package
agPackage.description: Package, crate, or other container holding an agricultural product or products for inspection.

applicant.title: Applicant
applicant.description: Entity that is applying for the inspection.

notes.title: Inspection Notes
notes.description: Any notes or comments the inspector wishes to make relevant to the inspection.

property.name: Izod Impact Strength Test
property.description: ISO 180 defines the method used for pendulums to determine the impact resistance of a plastic specimen when supported in a cantilever configuration. Test results are used to evaluate the resilience of materials, typically plastics.

example.additionalDeclaration: Explicabo eum sequi libero ut dignissimos a vel qui sed.

Place.title: Place
Place.description: Entities that have a somewhat fixed, physical location.

globalLocationNumber.title: Global Location Number (GLN)
globalLocationNumber.description: A Global Location Number (GLN) is the GS1 Identification Key used to identify physical locations or parties. The key comprises a GS1 Company Prefix, Location Reference and Check Digit. For more information, see http://www.gs1.org/gln.

geo.title: Geographic Coordinates
geo.description: Links to information about geocoordinates for a place.

address.title: Postal Address
address.description: The postal address for an organization or place.

PostalAddress.title: Postal Address
PostalAddress.description: The location at which a particular organization or person may be found or reached.

organizationName.title: Organization Name
organizationName.description: The name of the organization expressed in text.

streetAddress.title: Street Address
streetAddress.description: The street address expressed as free form text. The street address is printed on paper as the first lines below the name. For example, the name of the street and the number in the street or the name of a building.

addressLocality.title: Address Locality
addressLocality.description: Text specifying the name of the locality; for example, a city.

addressRegion.title: Address Region
addressRegion.description: Text specifying a province or state in abbreviated format; for example, NJ.

addressCountry.title: Address Country
addressCountry.description: Code specifying the country (and country subdivision) for the address using ISO 3166-1.

crossStreet.title: Cross Street
crossStreet.description: A street intersecting a main street (usually at right angles) and continuing on both sides of it.

countyCode.title: County Code
countyCode.description: A code that identifies a county. A county is a territorial division in some countries, forming the chief unit of local administration. In the US, a county is a political and administrative division of a state.

postalCode.title: Postal Code
postalCode.description: Text specifying the postal code for an address.

postOfficeBoxNumber.title: Post Office Box Number
postOfficeBoxNumber.description: The number that identifies a PO box. A PO box is a box in a post office or other postal service location assigned to an organization where postal items may be kept.

ppq203.title: PPQ 203 Agricultural Foreign Site Inspection
ppq203.description: United States Department of Agriculture Foreign Site Certificate of Inspection and/or Treatment.

foreignPortExport.title: Foreign Port of Export
foreignPortExport.description: Foreign port which the shipment passed through as an export to the US

portOfEntry.title: Port of Entry
portOfEntry.description: US port through which the imports passed.

signatureDate.title: signatureDate
signatureDate.description: Date when the inspection was signed by the inspection officer.

inspector.title: Inspector
inspector.description: Inspector performing the Agriculture Inspection.  The following link provides further insight: https://www.lawinsider.com/dictionary/food-inspector

shipment.title: Shipment
shipment.description: Details for a shipment of goods.

applicant.title: Applicant
applicant.description: Entity that is applying for the inspection.

observation.title: Observation List
observation.description: List of observations as seen and specified in the Inspection Report schema, https://w3id.org/traceability?#InspectionReport

property.name: Charpy Impact Strength Test
property.description: ISO 148-1:2016 specifies the Charpy (V-notch and U-notch) pendulum impact test method for determining the energy absorbed in an impact test of metallic materials. This part of ISO 148 does not cover instrumented impact testing, which is specified in ISO 14556.

sizeOrAmount.title: Size or Amount
sizeOrAmount.description: The size or amount of the product

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The quantity of the product contained by a package.

packagingType.title: Packaging Type
packagingType.description: Links to details about packaging material type, quantity and thickness

sku.title: Sku Number
sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e., a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or for the product to which the offer refers.

example.name: Handmade Concrete Fish
example.description: The Nagasaki Lander is the trademarked name of several series of Nagasaki sport bikes, that started with the 1984 ABC800J

ProductRegistrationEvidenceDocument.title: Product Registration Evidence Document
ProductRegistrationEvidenceDocument.description: Evidence data for a registered eCommerce Product

category.title: A category for the product item.

inProductGroupWithID.title: Indicates the productGroupID for a ProductGroup
inProductGroupWithID.example: valid Product Group ID number per schema.org, could be NULL (required)

productID.title: Product ID
productID.example: Product number of registering Legal Entity such as an ISBN (required)

gtin.title: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN)
gtin.example: valid GTIN as number or URL per GS1 spec (required)

isAccessoryOrSparePartFor.title: Is accessory or sparepart for
isAccessoryOrSparePartFor.example: A pointer to another product (or multiple products) for which this product is an accessory or spare part; may be empty (required)

releaseDate.title: Release date of a product or product model
releaseDate.example: date when product (version) was first released (required)

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer name or brand of the product

globalLocationNumber.title: Global Location Number (GLN)
globalLocationNumber.description: A Global Location Number of the manufacturer issued by GS1 (required), for more information see http://www.gs1.org/gln.

leiCode.title: Global Location Number (GLN)
leiCode.description: A Legal Entity Identifier of the manufacturer issued by GLEIF (required), for more information see https://gleif.org

model.title: Model of the product
model.example: produdct model name, a URL is also allowed (required)

material.title: Material the product is made from
material.example: Material the product is made from, could be specified as 'composites' (required)

weight.title: Weight of the product
weight.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measure (kg) (required)

height.title: Height of the product
height.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measure (meter) (required)

width.title: Width of the product
width.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measure (meter) (required)

depth.title: Depth of the Product
depth.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measure (meter) (required)

url.title: Url or the product item
url.example: URL of the product; could be empty (required)

isBasedOn.title: Is based on
isBasedOn.example: URI for the resource, e.g., patent, from which this work is derived or from which it is a modification or adaption; could be empty (required)

image.title: Image of the product
image.example: encoded picture of the product as a URI/URL (required)

example.name: Fantastic Metal Computer
example.description: New range of formal shirts are designed keeping you in mind. With fits and styling that will make you stand apart

customer.title: Customer
customer.description: The buying party of a purchase

invoice.title: Invoice
invoice.description: The invoice associated with a purchase

purchaseOrder.title: Purchase Order
purchaseOrder.description: The purchase order associated with a purchase

Qualification.title: Qualification
Qualification.description: Skills, certifications, etc., required to perform a job properly.

qualificationCategory.title: Qualification Category
qualificationCategory.description: The type of qualification, credential, or certification the person has.

qualificationValue.title: Qualification Value
qualificationValue.description: Value of the qualification (if relevant), such as badge number or certification level.

QuantitativeValue.title: Quantitative Value
QuantitativeValue.description: A point value or interval for product characteristics and other purposes

ShippingStop.title: Shipping Stop Schema
ShippingStop.description: Shipping Stop definition based on IATA electronic Air Way Bill https://blanker.org/files/air-waybill-2.xls

SteelProduct.title: Steel Product
SteelProduct.description: A finished or unfinisheed manufactured steel product

heatNumber.title: Heat Number
heatNumber.description: The only way to trace a steel plate back to its mill sheet is the heat number

originalCountryOfMeltAndPour.title: Original Country Of Melt and Pour
originalCountryOfMeltAndPour.description: The country where the product was first melted and poured.

inspection.title: Inspection
inspection.description: Observations of chemical and mechanical properties of the product

purchase.title: Purchase
purchase.description: Purchase details about a product and its customer

property.name: Izod Impact Strength Test
property.description: ISO 180 defines the method used for pendulums to determine the impact resistance of a plastic specimen when supported in a cantilever configuration. Test results are used to evaluate the resilience of materials, typically plastics.

TotalCharge.title: TotalCharge
TotalCharge.description: TotalCharge definition based on IATA electronic Air Way Bill https://blanker.org/files/air-waybill-2.xls
